summary: Test suite for the Stable Diffusion image‑to‑image pipeline with Plug‑and‑Play (PAG) support, containing fast unit tests that use lightweight dummy components and full integration tests that run on real models to verify PAG enable/disable behavior, basic inference, and conditional/unconditional generation.
business_intent: Validate the correctness and robustness of the PAG‑enabled image‑to‑image diffusion pipeline, ensuring that the feature can be toggled safely and that the pipeline produces expected results in both quick unit test scenarios and full‑scale integration scenarios, thereby supporting reliable product releases.
